goal.ch: “- 取得世界及台灣地震目錄- 了解地震預報方法- 地震預報實作“
goal.en: “- Obtain earthquake catalogue for earthquake in the globe and Taiwan- Understand approaches for earthquake forecasting- Practice earthquake forecasting approach“

outline.ch: “- 課程簡介、大綱與分組- 地震與全球板塊構造- 地震資料與處理- 大地震預報方法- 全球地震深度分布- 小組報告- 地震學方法預報地震的限制- 活動斷層參數- 利用活動斷層參數預報地震- 台灣地震目錄- 期末考- 期末考檢討“
outline.en: “- Introduction, outline, and grouping - Earthquake and global plate tectonics- Data used- Methods for forecasting probabilities of large earthquakes- Global earthquakes in different depth ranges- Group presentations for earthquake forecasting- Limitation of these seismological approaches - Active fault parameters- Earthquakes forecasting considering active faults- Earthquake catalogues in Taiwan- Final exam- Review the exam results“

textbook.ch: 蔡義本，2019：The Next Big Ones: Forecasting the Probability of Large Earthquakes in the World。國立中央大學出版中心
textbook.en: “Tsai, Y.B., 2019. The Next Big Ones: Forecasting the Probability of Large Earthquakes in the World. National Central University Press“
